message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $120. I know it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to negotiate a bit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't want to go above that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $100 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $110.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $105?
